title: Remove Playwright dependencies and config
description:
Clean up Playwright after migrating to agent-browser.

Files to remove:
- playwright.config.ts
- tests/e2e/*.spec.ts (all Playwright test files)
- tests/e2e/helpers/cleanup.ts

Dependencies to remove from package.json:
- @playwright/test
- playwright

Scripts to remove from package.json:
- test:e2e (or update to reference agent-browser workflow)

Steps:
1. Verify all E2E flows work with agent-browser first
2. Remove Playwright config and test files
3. pnpm remove @playwright/test playwright
4. Update package.json scripts
5. pnpm install to update lockfile

Test: pnpm install succeeds, no Playwright references remain
